title: 🎵🎵Moving On Up....🎵🎵
posting_body: ['Call for specials!!!', 'We do not accept section 8', 'Thank you for your interest in Willow Creek Apartments!', 'We offer cozy 1- & 2-bedroom apartments and spacious 2-bedroom townhomes.', ' I have included all information that will be helpful.', 'Click the Link for 2 Bedroom apartment tour.', '<URL>', 'Apartment homes available!', 'Reserve your new home TODAY!', '1-bedroom, 1 bath apartment home – $975.00\tAvailable', '2-bedroom, 1 bath apartment home – $1100.00      Available', '2-bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome – starting at $1400.00   Available', 'Gas, heat, water, sewer and trash are included in the rent!!', '*Application fees are $35 per adult, must move within 2 weeks of approval', '*A $100.00 deposit is due with the application.', '(The deposit is refundable if the application is not approved)', '**', 'When applying please provide 4 recent paystubs, photo ID, and social security card.', '***In order to qualify for an apartment home, you will need to show that you gross a minimum of 3x the monthly rent; have more positive credit than negative; no prior evictions or monies owed to a prior landlord; we do process a background screen.', 'See attachments for the application packet', 'We are available to answer any questions', 'Monday- Friday from 9:00am – 6:00pm', 'Saturday from 9:00am – 4:00pm.', 'I look forward to hearing from you!', 'Sincerely,', 'Willow Creek Apartments', '1673 Fairwood Dr.', 'Westland, MI  48185', 'show contact info', '<URL>', 'EHO', 'Katie Aniol', 'Harvest Properties']
